description.value:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Nature Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Nature Domain Spells
Cleric LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAnimalFrie]{Animal Friendship}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpeakWithA]{Speak with Animals}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBarkskin00]{Barkskin}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpikeGrowt]{Spike Growth}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPlantGrowt]{Plant Growth}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWindWall00]{Wind Wall}
7th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominateBe]{Dominate Beast}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGraspingVi]{Grasping Vine}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDestructiv]{Destructive Wave}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplTreeStride]{Tree Stride}
